CustomField.formula:
IF (clofor_com_cfs__LoadLocation__r.clofor_com_cfs__LoadTEL__c = NULL, "", 'TEL: '& clofor_com_cfs__LoadLocation__r.clofor_com_cfs__LoadTEL__c) & IF (clofor_com_cfs__LoadLocation__r.clofor_com_cfs__LoadFAX__c = NULL, "", ' FAX: '& clofor_com_cfs__LoadLocation__r.clofor_com_cfs__LoadFAX__c)
/* 'TEL: ' & clofor_com_cfs__LoadLocation__r.clofor_com_cfs__LoadTEL__c & ' FAX: ' & clofor_com_cfs__LoadLocation__r.clofor_com_cfs__LoadFAX__c */
CustomField.label: CARGO LOADING WAREHOUSE TEL/FAX(LOCAL)
